title: Papua New Guinea
excerpt: Papua New Guinea (PNG) is a beautiful Pacific nation known for its rich cultures, tropical islands, and incredible biodiversity.
content:
Papua New Guinea (PNG) occupies the eastern half of the island of New Guinea and hundreds of smaller islands in the Pacific.
Its capital is Port Moresby.
PNG’s landscape includes tall mountain ranges, dense rainforests, and beautiful coral reefs.
The economy is based on natural resources such as gold, copper, oil, and gas, as well as farming and fishing.
Despite its natural wealth, PNG faces development challenges in infrastructure, education, and healthcare.
Visitors are drawn to its cultural festivals, traditional music and dance, birdwatching, diving spots, and opportunities for eco-tourism.
description:
Papua New Guinea is located in the southwest Pacific Ocean, just north of Australia.
It is famous for its diverse languages, colorful traditions, rugged mountains, and unique wildlife.
The country is home to over 800 languages and many distinct cultural groups, making it one of the most culturally rich nations in the world.
